column4: I'm trying to connect to my ubuntu desktop (I've already enabled Remote Desktop), but when I connect from VNC I get a dialog box saying 'No matching security types'. What is wrong here?
on your vnc client (the one you are connecting from)
I'm using the free vncviewer 4 on Windows.
the no matching security types usually indicates an encryption or auth problem (client and server not agreeing on the settings)
